title: @riot strange 2day ban. very wierd. whats up?
body:
first i want to say the reason/purpose of this post

1) i do-not-care about my 2 day ban. i do, however, want to take steps to PREVENT my account from getting a perma-banned

2) so the PURPOSE and REASON of this post is i want a very specific and informing response from riot where they clearly state what kind of chat is "bannable" and can lead to a perma-ban on an account

3) for example. if riot says "whining in chat cant get you perma-banned on a first strike. but if you whine in chat and get 3 strikes from that, then you can indeed get perma banned from it" then that essentially would let me know that riots policy is "YES. WHINING IN CHAT CAN GET YOU PERMA BANNED"

and if i am aware of that. then i will stop whining in chat.

4) so riot. please speak with people in your banning department and try to get a clear absolute informative answer on what type of chat can lead to a player being perma banned. and im asking for ANY AND ALL situations

if "whining in chat" cant get you perma banned on a first strike, but it CAN get you perma banned with 3 strikes of "whining in chat", then that is VERY VERY IMPORTANT IMFORMATION and i need to know about it. because that essentially means that YES, whining in chat CAN AND WILL GET YOU PERMA BANNED if you keep doing it


5) all i want is ANSWERS. i dont care about my 2-day ban, however i desperately want to know what CAN ACTUALLY get my account perma-banned, so i can know to NEVER-DO those actions

6) so riot please please tell me what i did that caused me to deserve my 2day ban. explain to me what i did that is apparently "bannable", so i can know what to stop doing to prevent future bans. 

because i am assuming, that ii something can get me a 2day ban, then it probably can get me a perma-ban too. and right now, i really am starting to believe that i received my 2day ban due to "whining in chat" (which to this day, i assumed you could never get perma-banned for simply whining in chat)

_______________________________________________

i recently got a 25 game chat restriction for "toxicity"

i looked at the chat logs given to me and i couldnt even find anything toxic in there.... i was just complaining saying  "jeeze why do i get a int feeder on my team" and things like that. and i was saying that when my jungler would LITERALLY run into my lane and int-feed my enemy toplaner

am i not allowed to whine about my jungler int-feeding when that is LITERALLY what hes doing????????????

first i have a question to riot.  is it really toxic and bannable for me to say that? 

because from all things i have learned so far from the banning system, i thought that no, it is not "wrong and bannable" to say those things. all im doing is complaining and whining about my team, and while it may be annoying, im not swearing to saying racist insults or anything.... all im doing is "whining"

if riot literally comes out and SAYS that "yes, whining is bannable" then fine, i will accept that and i will stop whining in chat

however, up until today, i literally have assumed that "whining in chat" is okay and acceptable, and while annoying it is not "toxic and bannable". i thought only offensive comments, racist comments, etc, were bannable. So if riot actually comes out and says "whining in chat is indeed bannable" then OKAY GREAT, i will take this new knowledge and i will accept it, and i will stop "whining in chat" because i do not want my account to be banned



ALSO RIOT THE ACCOUNT IM TALKING ABOUT IS NOT MSATIE

the account that was banned for 2days is  KAOKENTAKE

riot. please look into KAOKENTAKE and inform me what that account did that caused it to deserve its 2day ban

also. i just finished 25 games of chat restriction. and i basically havnt typed much at all in those 25 games of chat restriction. ive basically been typing near-nothing in all my 25 games of chat restriction and the 3-4 games i had after the chat restriction. so honestly, i am perplexed riot, what did i do in those 29 games to deserve a 2day ban?

 or was i somehow banned for those whining-games that i already got a chat restriction for?

replies.body: We don't do 2 day bans. Check the year in addition to the day. It's more than likely a perma-ban. You'll have to wait for player support though.

great answer babe! <3 keep up all your hard work!
riot i would luv a answer =/

heyyy look at that. yea it went from 2day ben to 2week ban

regardless. dont care about my ban. my question still stands

if you read my original post, my question is simply  "can whining in chat get you banned?"

because i think thats what i was banned for. but i may be wrong. i dont know actually what got me banned

i was looking at my chat logs that got me a chat restriction, and in my opinion all i was doing was i was whining about my team. i was saying  things like "jeez why do i get a int feeder on my team" when i actually had someone running into my lane and int feeding. i have assumed chat like that is okay, but if i was banned for that i would like to know


i put in a ticket to player support but their not responding. all i wanna know is what i was banned for, and if i truly was banned for my "chat" (which was just whining, and nothing racist / hate speech or anything like that) then ill know to just never type anything because apparently whining about your teammates is bannable now
Yes. If you are complaining about your teammates constantly, you can get punished.
Can you just please respond to him?
i thought whining in chat was called greiving? <3
Are you confused.
thats what ive always heard it called babe

sent in ticket. no response

riot pls respond

Submit a ticket to Riot support asking for information on your ban. 2 day bans are unheard of so it might be an error or perhaps the wrong punishment. Could even be account security too.

Boards wont be able to help you since we don't have access to why you were banned. 

Good luck.

no email

riots support never responds to this type of thing

literally the only way to get a real genuine answer is to post on the boards and have a riot poster look into it
Have you tried sending in a ticket or are you just assuming you won't get a response?

I understand no email was sent to you since you stated above. What I am saying is contact Riot support to receive information on that ban since you did not receive an email. If this was an error it can clear your account and regain your reputation if this was an accidental ban based on behavior. 

They do respond to it, but you do need to have patience. Riot Support still consists of human beings, so they are not instantaneous like an automated system. It can take hours to a few days before you receive a response, so please keep that in mind when waiting.

You won't get a genuine answer on the boards. It isn't guaranteed a Rioter will take the time to respond to your post, so it's better to directly contact them via Support instead of waiting for that very small chance they'll respond.
